column1: '''''The Homecoming of Beorhtnoth''''' is a reprint of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s "[[The Homecoming of Beorhtnoth]]" in a separate publication (a special limited edition of 300 booklets, each hand-numbered, to commemorate the 1000th anniversary of the ''[[Wikipedia:Battle of Maldon
column2: Battle of Maldon]]'').<ref>[http://www.tolkienbooks.net/php/details.php?reference=33420 Record Number: 33420] at [http://www.tolkienbooks.net/ TolkienBooks.net] (accessed 29 March 2011)</ref><ref>[[Ã…ke Bertenstam]], "[http://www.forodrim.org/bibliography/tbchron.html A Chronological Bibliography of the Writings of J.R.R.
